sentences.en: Attitudes to automation vary across a wide spectrum.
sentences.cn: 人们对自动化的态度各不相同.

sentences.en: Automation by means of computers.
sentences.cn: 借助计算机而实现自动化.

sentences.en: Automation has helped to increase production.
sentences.cn: 自动化促进了生产的发展.

sentences.en: Automation has largely dispensed with the need for manual checking, ie made it unnecessary.
sentences.cn: 实行了自动化就在很大程度上不需要人工检验了.

sentences.en: Automation has obsoleted many unskilled workers.
sentences.cn: 自动化使很多非技术工人受到淘汰.

sentences.en: Automation is on the march.
sentences.cn: 自动化在发展中.

sentences.en: Automation meant the loss of many factory jobs.
sentences.cn: 自动化意味着许多工厂工人失业。

sentences.en: Automation will mean the loss of many jobs in this factory.
sentences.cn: 自动化将意味着这个工厂要减少许多工作职位.

sentences.en: Automation would bring a shorter, more flexible working week.
sentences.cn: 自动化会使工作周缩短，也更为灵活。

sentences.en: But its most natural target is in automation of system scripting and text processing tasks.
sentences.cn: 但是它最自然的目标在于系统脚本的自动化和本文处理任务。

sentences.en: Dave and I big on using automation . That's why the computer is there.
sentences.cn: 戴夫和我非常善于使用自动化(automation),其实计算机就是用来干这个的.

sentences.en: In the last ten years automation has reduced the work force here by half.
sentences.cn: 在过去的10年中，自动化已经减少了这里一半的劳动力。

sentences.en: The automation line heightens the effect.
sentences.cn: 自动线能提高效率.

sentences.en: The laboratory automation techniques have their greatest use in the clinical laboratory.
sentences.cn: 实验室自动化技术在现场实验室中得到最广泛的应用.

sentences.en: The newspapers and radio have familiarized the word'automation '.
sentences.cn: 报纸和无线电广播使 " 自动化 " 一词家喻户晓了.

sentences.en: Then you could have your test automation read, parse, and use the data in this file.
sentences.cn: 然后您可以让您的测试自动化读取、解析和使用该文件中的数据。

sentences.en: These have focused on simplifying the development, automation, and optimization of applications.
sentences.cn: 这主要集中在简化应用程序的开发、自动化和优化方面。

sentences.en: These two visions imply such enormous increases in productivity as a corollary to automation.
sentences.cn: 这两种观点都把劳动生产率的巨大提高看成是自动化的必然结果.

sentences.en: They phrase in new machinery for increased automation.
sentences.cn: 他们逐步采用新机器以提高自动化程度。

sentences.en: This factory has phased in new machinery for increased automation.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂已开始逐渐使用新机器以提高自动化程度。

words.tran_cn: 自动的；无意识的；必然的
自动地；机械地；无意识地
自动售货机；[自] 自动机；自动贩卖式餐馆
自动作用；[医] 自动症；自动性
自动机；机器人；自动机器
自动化（automate的过去分词）；自动操作

phrases.tran_cn: 自动化设备；自动化装置
过程自动化；工序自动化

trans.tran_en: the use of computers and machines instead of people to do a job
